app.desc:
Agrumino OpenSource Temperature and Soil Moisture sensor

Agrumino not only a simple Temperature and Soil Moisture sensor, but is a very DevBoard.

Technical specifications


Chip Esp8266 with Wifi 2,4 Ghz,Temperature sensor, Lux sensor, Soil Moisture sensor, I2C connector, Level sensor connector, connector for 2 GPIO, connector for water pump (3,7 V), 1 custom button, connector for external power battery (example 18650 3,7 V), battery Holder for Lir2450 Rechargeable (included).

For detail visit https://bit.ly/2Ya3vK7
